name: Key's not Included
description:
We made this game for the First Game Jam: Winter 2021.  As an Engine we used the Unity Engine. All the art is done by the amazing Fullbrainztench. The music and sound effects were created by our talented musician Timooff and programming was done by mastermind  MathewHD. Because the theme of the Game Jam is "Locked", we thought of multiple ideas and all agreed on making a Rogue Like where you try to escape, because you were locked in and experimented on.

Quotes:

Timooff : "I WANT A CLOWN!!!! AND I WILL NOT ACCEPT NO AS AN ANSWER!!!!!🤡 "

Fullbrainztench: "No clowns in gulag, please."

MathewHD: "Sounds legit enough."
